title: by section 182A of the Credit Union Act, 1997 (No. 15 of 1997) (the “Act”), the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Credit Union Act 1997
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Credit Union Act 1997 

(Regulatory Requirements) (Amendment) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited credit union act 1997 (regulatory requirements) (amendment) regulation 2024

title: by section 182A of the Credit Union Act, 1997 (No. 15 of 1997) (the “Act”), the
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Credit Union Act
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Regulations” means the Credit Union Act 

1997 (Regulatory Requirements) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 1 of 2016).
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean credit union act 1997 (regulatory requirements) regulation 2016 (s.i no 1 2016)

title: by section 182A of the Credit Union Act, 1997 (No. 15 of 1997) (the “Act”), the
heading: 3. Regulation 2 of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2 of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting the 

following definition after the definition of “Irish and EEA State Securities”: 

“‘member’ includes a person in respect of whom services are being offered 
or provided by a credit union – 

(a) 

as part of an agreement referred to in section 35(2)(c) of the Act; 
or 

(b) pursuant to the receipt of a referral from another credit union in 

accordance with section 51A of the Act;”
text_norm: 3 regulation 2 principal regulation amended inserting following definition definition irish eea state security member includes person respect service offered provided credit union - (a) part agreement referred section 35(2)(c) act (b) pursuant receipt referral another credit union accordance section 51a act

title: by section 182A of the Credit Union Act, 1997 (No. 15 of 1997) (the “Act”), the
heading: 4. Regulation 43 of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting
text_raw:
4. Regulation 43 of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting 

“at least every 3 years” for “at least annually”.
text_norm: 4 regulation 43 principal regulation amended substituting least every 3 year least annually

title: by section 182A of the Credit Union Act, 1997 (No. 15 of 1997) (the “Act”), the
heading: 5. Regulation 46(2) of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting
text_raw:
5. Regulation 46(2) of the Principal Regulations is amended by substituting 

“at least every 3 years” for “at least annually”.
text_norm: 5 regulation 46(2) principal regulation amended substituting least every 3 year least annually

title: by section 182A of the Credit Union Act, 1997 (No. 15 of 1997) (the “Act”), the
heading: 6. The revocation, amendment or substitution of any enactment, or part of
text_raw:
6. The revocation, amendment or substitution of any enactment, or part of 

enactment, by these Regulations – 

(a) 

shall not affect any direction given by the Bank, any investigation 
or any disciplinary, sanctioning or enforcement action undertaken 
by the Bank or by any other person, in respect of any matter in 
existence at, or before, the time of the revocation, amendment or 
substitution, and 

(b) 

shall not preclude the taking of any legal proceedings, or the 
undertaking of any investigation, or disciplinary, sanctioning or 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [496] 3 

enforcement action by the Bank or any other person, in respect of 
any contravention of an enactment (including anything revoked, 
amended or substituted by these Regulations) or any misconduct 
which may have been committed before the time of the 
revocation, amendment or substitution. 

Signed for and on behalf of the CENTRAL BANK OF IRELAND 
 30 September 2024 

ELAINE BYRNE 
 Registrar of Credit Unions 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [496]

title: by section 182A of the Credit Union Act, 1997 (No. 15 of 1997) (the “Act”), the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to amend the Credit Union Act 1997 
(Regulatory Requirements) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 1 of 2016). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [496] 5
